result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Meghan Elaine-Wahlin Bauer

records.addlTxt: to Modify Bond - Filed by Atty Derek Sanders

10:13 AM Defendant Meghan Elaine-Wahlin Bauer appeared in person, in custody. Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Meghan Elaine-Wahlin Bauer. Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. NMG-Clerk Reading waived. NG plea entered on all counts. CT accepts plea, 15 days pre arraignment rights. adj. 10:17 am
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on November 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.

8:57 am. State calls Officer Bonebreak - S&T. CT finds identification made. Cross by Atty Sanders. Atty Sanders provides argument and motions to dismiss. CT finds PC, Def bound over for trial. Bond cont. 9:10 am adj.
Arraignment scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.

8:31 AM. JL-Clerk.  Defendant Meghan Elaine-Wahlin Bauer in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Derek W Sanders appeared by video for Meghan Elaine-Wahlin Bauer. 8:33 am video cart restarted due to technical difficulties. 8:36 am back on. Def is advised of her right to have counsel present in person for hearing. Def wishes to move forward with hearing with counsel appearing by Zoom. 8:40 am recess for Def to speak w/counsel. 8:48 am back on, Def still wishes to proceed with counsel appearing by Zoom and wishes to address bond modification first. Atty Sanders motions for bond modification. State objects. CT denies request for bond modification.
for Modification of Bond - Filed by Atty Derek Sanders

records.addlTxt: No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.
